archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Update folder.xml
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The folder.xml resides in https://git.evry.cloud/Enta/<Repository Name>/tree/master/model. Just under the tag "xmlns:archimate="http://www.archimatetool.com/archimate"", there's a tag called "name". This is the name of the model and should be changed in order to avoid confusion when importing the repository to Archi for the first time. The folder.xml resides in https://git.evry.cloud/Enta/<Repository Name>/tree/master/model. Just under the tag "xmlns:archimate="http://www.archimatetool.com/archimate"", there's a tag called "name". This is the name of the model and should be changed in order to avoid confusion when importing the repository to Archi for the first time.
